title: place.workflowStatus
description:
The status of the [place](./place.json) in the moderation workflow.

Can be one of four types:

- `DRAFT`: The place is still a draft and should not be visible on publication channels
- `READY_FOR_VALIDATION`: The place is submitted for validation. Some publication channels may choose to show these
- `APPROVED`: The place is approved and will be visible on all publication channels (depending on its `availableFrom` and `availableTo`)
- `DELETED`: The place was deleted and should not be visible on any publication channels.
